summary: The customer was looking for more information about Contoso Wireless' other products and the agent provided details about the features and benefits of these products, such as faster internet speeds, unlimited data plans, access to exclusive content, free device protection plans, and a rewards program. The agent also informed the customer about a limited time promotion for a free device upgrade after six months of service. Finally, the agent gave instructions on how to get started with purchasing one of the other products.
